alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 29 at 3:43PM MST until July 29 at 5:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE MUSEUM FIRE SCAR BURN SCAR REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 343 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated light to moderate showers over the Museum fire scar which are expected to continue through 4:30 PM. The threat for heavy rain has ended for now. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Museum Fire scar. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Museum Fire scar. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Flagstaff. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Schultz Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Immediately move out of and away from creeks and washes in the Museum Fire scar. Flash flooding is occurring or imminent. Turn Around, Don`t Drown if you encounter flood waters while driving.
